bookmarks.linkValidation: Link must have a URL (website address).
bookmarks.stackVertDesc: Displays links in a vertical list instead of horizontal.
bookmarks.topSitesPermission: Allow extension to access Top Sites

common.alignTextDesc: Changes alignment of the text. You may not notice a change depending on other settings.
common.label: Label
common.marginHeightDesc: Adjust the spacing above and below the widget. This can be useful to provide some spacing away from the edge of the screen or between widgets.
common.marginWidthDesc: Adjust the spacing to the left and right of the widget. This can be useful to provide some spacing away from the edge of the screen or between widgets.
common.maxWidthDesc: Sets the maximum width that the widget can span relative to the width of the screen. This could cause widgets to display smaller than intended if the window is made too small.
common.offsetDesc: Offset will move the widget up or down, overlapping adjacent widgets. This can be useful for getting different widgets closer together.
common.orderDesc: Changes the display order of widgets within the position it is set to.
common.positionDesc: Move the widget to different positions on the screen. This could cause widgets to overlap, adjust other layout settings for optimal display.
common.sizeDesc: Adjusts the size of the widget. This is relative to the global size.
common.heightDesc: Sets the height that the widget will span relative to the height of the screen. This could cause widgets to display smaller than intended if the window is made too small.
common.overrideGlobalColorsDesc: Choose custom colors for this widget.
common.premiumLabel: Sign up for Premium to access this feature
common.premiumLabelThankYou: Thank you for subscribing to Premium. Enjoy the benefits!
common.saveAndClose: Save and close (refresh page to cancel)
common.widthDesc: Sets the width that the widget will span relative to the width of the screen. This could cause widgets to display smaller than intended if the window is made too small.

dashboard.credit: CaretTab| is designed and coded by |BlueCaret| and is licensed under the |MIT License|.
dashboard.supportBox: Need help? Post on |GitHub| or email |bluecaret@outlook.com
dashboard.getPremiumAccessDesc: Personalize your New Tab page further by subscribing to Premium today!
dashboard.rmsDesc: Easily run JavaScript code on the current browser tab
dashboard.rmsLink: Check out RMS on the Chrome Web Store
dashboard.tsfDesc: A To Do list for your New Tab page
dashboard.tsfLink: Check out Two Steps Forward on the Chrome Web Store

date.weekIsoDesc: Use the ISO week date system from ISO 8601 date and time standard.

design.customFontDesc: Enter the name of a locally installed font. You must install the font on your computer for it to work.
design.customFontUsage: To use a custom font, you must type the font name exactly. Custom fonts must be |installed locally on your computer|. You can get more fonts from |Google Fonts| or from |1001 Free Fonts|.
design.dontSync: Custom images do not sync across computers.
design.dynScaleDesc: Dynamic scaling allows you to change the size of elements based on the width of your browser. Disable to keep the size the same no matter the size of your browser.
design.fontWeightDesc: Select a font weight for your custom font. Some fonts do not support all weights.
design.getMorePatterns: Get more patterns at |Transparent Textures| or |Toptal|.
design.globalSizeDesc: Adjust the size of all elements.
design.hardToSee: Image too hard to see? Try changing the filter.
design.author: Author:
design.newPhotoDesc: Request a new random photo from the selected Unsplash list.
design.noSearchResults: No results found, please try a different search.
design.randomDailyUnsplash: Random daily photo from Unsplash lists
design.randomDailyUnsplashDesc: Selecting a list will show a random photo from that list each day. Choose what type of lists you would like to browse.
design.resetWallpaperStylesDesc: Reset brightness, contrast, saturation, blur, scale, and filter options back to default.
design.searchUnsplashDesc: Find a single photo to use as the wallpaper from Unsplash.

extra.disableSelectDesc: This will prevent you from selecting text on the new tab page resulting in a cleaner look in case of accidental clicks.
extra.exportSettingsDesc: Export all CaretTab settings to a file. Clicking the button will download a file to your computer. Do not edit this file to ensure no errors when you re-import.
extra.hideMenuDesc: When enabled the menu button will display when you hover over the bottom right corner.
extra.importFailedDesc: The settings you are trying to import is from an unsupported version of CaretTab or is not in the correct format.
extra.importSettingsDesc: Import CaretTab settings from a file. Ensure you use the 'carettab-settings.json' file that was downloaded when you clicked export.
extra.importedSuccessfullyDesc: To save this import, close the settings panel and refresh the page. If you would like to cancel the import, refresh the tab without closing the settings panel.
extra.resetDesc: If you would like to reset all settings back to the default, you can click this button and then refresh the page. This will remove all of your settings.
extra.tabClockDesc: Choose what to display in the New Tab title (shows on the tab itself as well as in the browser's title bar).
extra.tabCustomTextDesc: Enter text for the custom tab title. Only applies if "Custom Text" is selected for Tab Title.
extra.tabTitleDesc: Choose what to display in the New Tab title (shows on the tab itself as well as in the browser's title bar).

message.randomMsgDesc: Multiple messages can be entered and a random one from that list will display each time the tab loads.

search.autocompleteDesc: Turn off to disable the browser's autocomplete feature on the search box.
search.label: Label

time.bracketsLeftDesc: Enter the symbol to represent the left-side bracket
time.bracketsOffset: Adjust the position of the brackets up or down
time.bracketsPaddingDesc: Adjust the padding between the brackets and the time
time.bracketsRightDesc: Enter the symbol to represent the right-side bracket
time.bracketsSize: Adjusts the size of the brackets relative to the clock
time.delimiterOffset: Adjust the position of the delimiter up or down
time.delimiterSize: Adjusts the size of the delimiter relative to the clock
time.label: Label
time.labelDesc: Displays a label next to the clock. Leave empty for no label.
time.labelOffset: Adjust the position of the label up or down
time.labelSize: Adjusts the size of the label relative to the clock
time.meridiemOffset: Adjust the position of the meridiem up or down
time.meridiemSize: Adjusts the size of the meridiem relative to the clock
time.noteText: the time is an educated guess based on the time and timezone your computer is set to and may not reflect your actual time. CaretTab is guessing your current timezone to be:
time.paddingDesc: Change the padding between the digits of the clock.
time.relativeEnable: Enable display of time relative to your local time.
time.relativeOffset: Adjust the position of the relative time label up or down
time.relativeSize: Adjusts the size of the relative time label relative to the clock
time.secondsOffset: Adjust the position of the seconds up or down
time.secondsSize: Adjusts the size of the seconds relative to the clock
time.sizeDesc: Change the size of the clock.
time.spanDesc: Changes how much space the clock uses. This can be used to display multiple clocks on the same line.
time.symbolDesc: Enter the symbol to represent the delimiter
time.timezoneDesc: Choose a timezone for the clock (the default is your local timezone).
time.twentyFourDesc: Display clock in 24-hour format instead of 12-hour.
time.twoDigitDesc: Always show the hour in two digits.

weather.paddingDesc: Changes the spacing between days in the forecast.
weather.preciseNumbersDesc: Displays weather statistics exactly as they are recorded. If disabled, numbers will be rounded to the nearest whole number.
weather.twentyFourDesc: Display all times in the weather in 24 hour format instead of 12 hour.

notepad.backgroundOpacityDesc: Add transparency to the notepad background
notepad.enableSpellcheckDesc: Allows the browser to run spellcheck on the notes (if available).
notepad.notesLimitedTo: Notes are currently limited to | characters.
notepad.paddingDesc: Change the padding between the edge and the text of the notepad.
notepad.roundedCornersDesc: Round the corners of the notepad box.
notepad.showCountDesc: Display the current character count and the total allowed in the bottom of the notepad.
notepad.syncNotesDesc: Allow notes to sync across computers. You must be signed in to the browser for syncing to work. Browsers have a higher restriction on syncing data, this means notes will be limited to only 2000 characters. Disabling sync for notes allows up to 250,000 characters.

intro.heading: Thank you for choosing CaretTab!
intro.p1: To get started select a language, then you can customize almost everything by clicking the settings icon in the bottom right.

premium.analogClockStylesDesc: Choose from different clock face and clock hand styles for the analog clock.
premium.andMoreDesc: Even more premium features available now and planned for the future!
premium.bgEffectsDesc: Change the size, contrast, saturation and blur of the wallpaper.
premium.disclaimer1: Subscription billed on a monthly recurring basis. Cancel at any time for any reason.
premium.disclaimer2: Payments processed via Stripe through ExtensionPay. View the |privacy policy|.
premium.heading: Premium Access
premium.justSubscribedP1: In order for premium features to be fully enabled, it is recommended to reload your tab.
premium.moreFontsDesc: Choose from even more fonts provided by Google Fonts.
premium.notepadDesc: Take quick notes or keep track of your grocery list with the Notepad widget.
premium.p1: Support the development of CaretTab with a Premium subscription. Here's what you get:
premium.thankYouForSupport: Thank you for your support by subscribing to
premium.thankYouJustSubscribed: Thank you! You are now subscribed to
premium.thankYouP1: By paying for Premium Access you receive many benefits within CaretTab including random background images, background effects, and more. Paying for Premium Access helps support the development of CaretTab. If you would like to cancel or manage your subscription you can click the button below.
premium.unsplashPhotosDesc: Display a single or daily random wallpaper from Unsplash.com.

toggleSettings.updated: Extension has been updated! Click here to open settings and see what's new.

v370.analogStyles: New analog clock face and hand styles (Premium only).
v370.bgEffects: New wallpaper options including contrast, saturation, blur, and scaling (Premium only).
v370.binaryOption: New binary clock option for displaying numbers instead of dots.
v370.covid: COVID widget has been removed. The data source that was used has been shut down and there is no longer a good source for this data.
v370.settings: New settings panel design for easier use and more flexibility for widget settings.
v370.unsplash: New wallpapers from Unsplash.com; get a single photo or display a random daily photo from a list (Premium only).
v370.backgroundMigration: Fixed migration of wallpaper from old version to new. Resolves issue where wallpaper wouldn't render on version 3.7.0 after updating.
